Title: With you in charge, I'm at ease
Designer: Chen Beixin (谌北心)Huang Naiyuan (黄乃源)Liu Wenxi (刘文西)Qin Dajian (秦大健)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Mao and Hua Guofeng in Mao's office-cum-library, with Mao handing over his 'testament' - three notes that Mao had written in late April 1976, the most famous one being "With you in charge, I'm at ease". This scene was replayed endlessly - but with minor variations - in propaganda posters. This moreover gave the people the opportunity to see that Mao's reading matter had not been limited to the narrow scope of publications that the masses had to make do with.
Theme: Mao and Hua: 'With you in charge, I'm at ease'To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
